oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Exts and the AGT relations
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Neguţ, Andrei
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: High Energy Physics - Theory
Mathematical Physics
Mathematics - Algebraic Geometry
Mathematics - Representation Theory
14D21, 81T13, 81R10
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We prove the connection between the Nekrasov partition function of N=2 super-symmetric U(2) gauge theory with adjoint matter and conformal blocks for the Virasoro algebra, as predicted by the Alday-Gaiotto-Tachikawa relations. Mathematically, this is achieved by relating the Carlsson-Okounkov Ext vector bundle on the moduli space of rank 2 sheaves with Liouville vertex operators.Our approach is geometric in nature, and uses a new method for intersection-theoretic computations of the Ext operator.
